```{r}

# Load necessary packages

library(tidyverse)

# Load necessary data

discharge_dat <- read_csv('discharge.csv')

```

Discharge calculation

```{r}

# EQUATION:

# D = (w/20000)*(d1*v1/4 + d2*v2 + d3*v3/4)
# w: cm
# d: cm
# v: m/s
# D: m^3/s


w <- test$width[1]
d1 <- test$depth[1]
d2 <- test$depth[2]
d3 <- test$depth[3]
v1 <- test$velocity[1]
v2 <- test$velocity[2]
v3 <- test$velocity[3]

D <- (w/20000)*(d1*v1/4 + d2*v2 + d3*v3/4)

### TEST WITH ARRHON UPSTREAM: 0.000713625

test <- discharge_dat %>% 
  filter(site == 'ARRHON',
         location == 'up')

### TEST WITH COLSPW UPSTREAM: 0.003115625

test <- discharge_dat %>% 
  filter(site == 'COLSPW',
         location == 'up')




```
